content.body: Kris Kowal: ok, I think I don't understand why the origin needs to be in EcmaScript. Is this to allow emulation of the html loader? should this be something that is on the html side, where we serialize it, and then when deserializing it we do a check? It may be that I am unfamiliar with the use case.
